link.description: Some games arn't perfect, but when the time is right, they are sufficient. With simply a usernames, friends of, and a timelock, Tardigrade catalyzes an ecosystem for the games one plays that may not be fair or trustless, but conditions nessissate them as sufficient means.  Games well encapsulated by the sayings such as - 'No big deal, just pay the bar tab next time your back', 'be back in an hour, please leave green fees in mailbox', and 'sure a young hooligan put his hand in there from time to time, but in the grand scheme of things it saved more hastle than it was'
